
# V1 Update Item Request

## Structure

`V1UpdateItemRequest`

## Fields

| Name | Type | Description | Getter | Setter |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `body` | [`V1Item`](/doc/models/v1-item.md) | V1Item | getBody(): V1Item | setBody(V1Item body): void |

```json
{
  "body": {
    "id": "id6",
    "name": "name6",
    "description": "description4",
    "type": "GIFT_CARD",

}
```
